description: Prompts de imagem para diferentes canais/estilos
global_negative_prompt: readable text, watermark, logo, signature, low resolution, blurry, cartoon, heavy CGI, oversharpen, excessive noise, extra fingers, deformed hands, deformed face, misaligned eyes, duplicated, artifacts, plastic skin, letters, words, writing, captions, labels, numbers, typography, font, subtitle, title, banner, UI elements

prompts.name: Espiritual - Chosen Ones
prompts.description: Estilo cinematográfico fotorrealista com magia sutil - teal & amber
prompts.template: Cinematic photorealistic scene, 35mm film texture with fine grain, filmic contrast, natural skin tones. Teal and petrol blue shadows, golden amber highlights and magical elements. Volumetric light with soft haze, glowing particles suspended in air, bokeh, lens reflections. Abstract mystical symbols (geometric mandalas, constellation patterns, luminous glyphs floating like dust). Central symmetric framing, clear subject in foreground, depth in background. Surreal subtle atmosphere - normal reality with one elegant impossible phenomenon
prompts.suffix: , 35mm film grain, teal and amber color grade, volumetric lighting, shallow depth of field, cinematic composition, photoreal, high detail, masterpiece quality
prompts.negative_prompt: readable text, watermark, logo, low resolution, blurry, cartoon, heavy CGI, oversharpen, excessive noise, extra fingers, deformed hands, deformed face, misaligned eyes, duplicated, artifacts, plastic skin, anime, sketch, drawing
prompts.quality_boost: 35mm film look, professional cinematography, natural lighting, photorealistic detail
